description: This file defines a React functional component named `QualityInspectionList` that displays a list of inspection items, allows users to execute inspections, update results, add notes, and raise non-conformance reports (NC). It includes UI elements for inspection management and interacts with external handlers for execution and NC raising.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Initializes and opens the inspection execution dialog for a selected inspection.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Submits the inspection results and closes the dialog.

methods.name: raiseNc
methods.description: Creates and raises a non-conformance report based on the current inspection and notes.

methods.name: renderItem
methods.description: Renders a checklist item based on its type (boolean, number, or text).
